Slash	Netmask	
/32	255.255.255.255
/31	255.255.255.254	
/30	255.255.255.252	
/29	255.255.255.248	
/28	255.255.255.240	
/27	255.255.255.224	
/26	255.255.255.192	
/25	255.255.255.128	
/24	255.255.255.0	
/23	255.255.254.0	
/22	255.255.252.0	
/21	255.255.248.0	
/20	255.255.240.0	
/19	255.255.224.0	
/18	255.255.192.0	
/17	255.255.128.0

1 to 10
2^1 = 2
2^2 = 4
2^3 = 8
2^4 = 16
2^5 = 32
2^6 = 64
2^7 = 128
2^8 = 256
2^9 = 512
2^10 = 1024
2^11 = 2048
http://vlsmcalc.net/
